page.title: 18Magic Roundabout in Swindon.
page.content: The Magic roundabout is one of Britain's busiest traffic spots. Over 24 million vehicles use it every year, which is almost 2,500 vehicles every hour of every day. Clearly it is the worst accident spot in Wiltshire. At this point 5 main roads converge and once created long traffic jams. A new type of roundabout was pioneered here and has proved very successful. Locsl people always called it the "Magic roundabout" but the local council named it "County roundabout". After many years of public pressure the name has been officially changed to the "Magic roundabout".
